name: Civilian Hostile
description: These guys just want to be useful, unfortunately, they aren't good at it.

name: Milita Guard
description: A fresh recruit who recently joined the other locals in defending their land.

name: Milita Grunt
description: Once a guard gains enough time on the battlefield, they are given a better rifle and a fancier helmet.

name: Milita Marksman
description: Some locals showed excellence in marksmanship, gaining them this special role.

name: Riot Police
description: One of the men Darwin hired to maintain control over the city, roaming the streets in riot gear. [Has Defense Buff]

name: Riot Police Captain
description: A high ranking minion of Darwin's. Commands a group of Riot Guards.

name: Port Authority Guard
description: Grunts taken from the local militas, tasked to guard the hallways of Dawrin's headquarters.

name: UN Defect/Rebel
description: Once a member of a UN Taskforce under Carlos, they followed him into defection.

name: Hazmat Facility Guard
description: Elite units from the United Eastern Front trained specifically to endure the Facility's toxic environment.

name: Hazmat Facility Elite Guard
description: A better equipped variant of the Facility Guard, these guys will throw gas grenades too.

name: Hank {BOSS}
description: Once was a mechanic back home, now the right-hand man of Ivanov, guarding the Fields.

name: Darwin {BOSS}
description: Once was an officer in the local Port, has took control of the City during the chaos.

name: Kurt {BOSS}
description: Mercenary working for the United Eastern Front, his main job is to secure the Facility.

name: Savage {BOSS}
description: One of the three Gang Leaders, Savage roams around the Safe Zone with his deadly shotgun.

name: Hunter {BOSS}
description: One of the three Gang Leaders, Hunter specialises in stealth, stalking his victim.

name: Knight {BOSS}
description: The Leader of the Gang. Knight does not go by his real name, even the other two bosses don't know his identity.
